amendment.description: To provide for a 1-year medication therapy management assessment program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1095 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1095 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Johnson. (consideration: CR S8617-8618, S8647; text: CR S8617-8618) To provide for a 1-year medication therapy management assessment program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1095 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1095 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Johnson.
